Ontologyïƒ

ancestors(go_id)ïƒ

Returns the list of all ancestors in the ontology for the given GO Term.

# Arguments

  • go_id - GO term ID.

# Returns

List of IDs of all the ancestors in the ontology (List of String)

batch_similarity(list1, list2, method, counter)ïƒ

Compute pairwise semantic similarity in batch using a selected method.

Parameters:

  • list1 (List[str]) â€“ First list of GO term IDs.

  • list2 (List[str]) â€“ Second list of GO term IDs.

  • method (str) â€“ Name of the similarity method. Options: â€œresnikâ€, â€œlinâ€.

  • counter (TermCounter) â€“ Precomputed IC values.

Returns:

List of similarity scores.

Return type:

List[float]

Raises:

ValueError â€“ If input lists differ in length or method is unknown.

common_ancestor(go_id1, go_id2)ïƒ

Returns the list of all the common ancestors in the ontology for the given GO Terms.

# Arguments

  • go_id1 - GO term ID 1.

  • go_id2 - GO term ID 2.

# Returns

List of IDs of all the common ancestors in the ontology (List of String)

deepest_common_ancestor(go_id1, go_id2)ïƒ

Returns the deepest common ancestor in the ontology for the given GO Terms.

# Arguments

  • go_id1 - GO term ID 1.

  • go_id2 - GO term ID 2.

# Returns

ID of the deepest common ancestor in the ontology. (String)

get_term_by_id(go_id)ïƒ

Gets the PyGoTerm object for the given GO Term ID.

# Arguments

  • go_id - GO term ID.

# Returns

PyGOTerm associated with the ID. (PyGOTerm)

semantic_similarity(id1, id2, method, counter)ïƒ

Compute semantic similarity between two GO terms using a selected method.

Parameters:

  • id1 (str) â€“ First GO term ID.

  • id2 (str) â€“ Second GO term ID.

  • method (str) â€“ Name of the similarity method. Options: â€œresnikâ€, â€œlinâ€.

  • counter (TermCounter) â€“ Precomputed IC values.

Returns:

Similarity score.

Return type:

float

Raises:

ValueError â€“ If the method is unknown.

term_ic(go_id, counter)ïƒ

Compute the Information Content (IC) of a GO term. Returns the Information Content (IC) value of a given GO term.

Parameters:

  • go_id (str) â€“ GO term identifier.

  • counter (TermCounter) â€“ Precomputed term counter with IC values.

Returns:

The IC of the GO term.

Return type:

float
